comment: I highly recommend taking Public Speaking with Dr. Young. His lectures are really good, and he is so helpful and patient, which makes the entire process less stressful.
Good guy. Definitely show up to class to do the participation activities. Other than that, super easy class.
Great professor, take him!

Really funny professor. Always tells jokes to lighten the mood & genuinely made me laugh. Lectures are never boring and makes the class easy and engaging. He's chill asf & relatable, even remembers everyone's name in the class. Graded participation activities are enjoyable free 100s with an online midterm & final outside of class.

If you ever have the chance to PLEASE take Dr. Young. He is an amazing professor and genuinely loves what he talks about. If you come to class and pay attention there's no way you'll fail. He is always available to help you in anyway he can and even gives you outlines for speeches. He makes class interesting and is one of my favorite professors.

Genuinely just a great guy! You'll always have fun in his class. He grades a bit tough on speeches the later you get into the semester, but overall there's no way you should have lower than an A in his class. Attendance is mandatory, but you get 5 free passes. 10/10 recommend him if you need to take public speaking. You won't regret it.

I took him for Public Speaking (Comm 1110) and I'm taking him again for Comm 1100. Amazing guy! Always greets everyone with a smile and a funny joke to lighten the mood. On the younger side, so he can really connect and relate with people which just adds to his charisma. I would 1000000% take him again!!!! Attendance mandatory!

Dr. Steven Young was a great professor who brought energy and a smile to class. I made new friends and appreciated his emphasis on the workbook and participation. He was always available after class to help, offered valuable suggestions, and responded to emails quickly. In addition, he does offer extra credit and surveys.

the speeches make up a good bit of your grade, he grades the writing pretty harshly and doesn't give a lot of feedback. however, as long as you present he doesn't grade the presentation itself super hard. pretty strict on attendance.
Very easy class, I took for my core class. He is really funny, and he will talk about e-sports, and sports alot, overall he is a great prof, he really cares.

Really cool dude but please participate in class as it can get awkward if no one replies to him. Overall he made it a comfortable class and there are weekly participation activities so make sure you are in class for those as you cannot make them up. Easy class though no reason to not have an A
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Young was great. It is quite impossible to fail his class. He gives simple assignments and the online textbook quizzes were so easy. I actually got to enjoy learning the content rather than worry about my grade. If you are able to take his class, I'd recommend it. Attendance is mandatory, he does participation activities in class

Dr. Young was an amazing professor. He was always very caring and he was funny. He can relate to students well because he talks about video games and football often. I learned a lot from his class! Definitely take him if you're thinking about taking human comm.

No one really wants to ever take public speaking, so when I saw I had to, I rushed to find Dr. Young's class. Had him before. He is great and even if people don't like the class, they like him so thennn they like the class. You get what I mean? If you need to take public speaking, pick him. You won't regret it.

Professor Young was way better than I expected. Be prepared to give five speeches for the public speaking course. The workbook is mandatory if you want receive credit and grades for all the speeches you will have to give. Loved this class.

He's a super cool guy that can talk to on a casual level. The lecture are full of just good information to know. The only time you will need the information in the lectures is for the midterms and final. We had 4 speeches and we had outlines with them. Smooth class... highly recommend

Half of the grade is reading the text book and completing the quizzes another part of it is participation. There is only a midterm and a final. He's a great professor and a stand p guy, but you have to do lot of memorization of terms and how to use them on the tests.

Loved taking his class! Participation and attendance matters, he only gives you 5 unexcused absences before it affects your grade. He's also super passionate about the subject so it's very easy to learn. There's also occasional extra credit. 10/10!

Dr. Young is the best professor I have had to date. His class is really fun if you like speaking, and if you dont, he creates an environment to help you feel supported and comfortable. Attendance is not mandatory but you get 6 abscences before it starts to lower your grade. Overall, very chill class and get ready to hear about the 49ers a lot.

Go to class. They are fun and he takes attendance via group work. Try to participate, because he will call on random if you don't. Class is easy and has a lot of online work. He's really funny and a great teacher and speaker. One of my favorite professors ever!

He's genuinely not a bad professor; he's just not terribly interesting to listen to. It was lecture after lecture. Throughout the entire semester, we gave maybe four speeches. Maybe it's not the professor, but I was disappointed with the low number of opportunities to give speeches.

Only graded by midterm and final and participation grades pretty much. Easy subject + great easygoing professor = fun class. He gives one participation grade per week that contributes to your final grade.

I was so worried about taking public speaking but he made it a breeze! Super nice and funny, and easy to talk to. The class is made up of 5 (?) speeches and 2 exams but he is very clear on requirements, due dates, and material. Highly recommend him I wouldn't have wanted to take the class with any other teacher.

Professor Young is the best. He truly cares about his students and provides all of the materials needed to succeed. If you show up to class and show that you care, you will do great. Professor Young just wants to see progress - Even if you're not the best at public speaking, he will make you feel comfortable and help you in any way he can,
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I really liked this class because he was very enthusiastic and cared about what we learned. He gives a good amount of time to work on speeches and he gives a lot of tools on how to write them. I definitely would take him again and recommend to anyone who wants to take this class.
Favorite class

Great professor if you actually wanna do something in class. He actually makes you do speeches and grades fairly. If you are an introvert he will definitely help you become more of an extrovert. He keeps everything in order and overall a great professor.

Dr. Young is a very understanding and very nice professor! He will help you in any way he can, and he will help you get better at Public Speaking. I do not like public speaking, but he helped me be comfortable and confident in public speaking. Would 100% say take him out of anyone for Public Speaking. You won't regret taking him! Best KSU Professor

Dr. Young is great! Attendance is required and the lectures are good. All of the reading material, quizzes, and tests are online, so just study and take notes and you'll get a good grade. I have accommodations and he was understanding.

He's a very unique professor, he's on the younger side so he's able to relate to the students more than most. His lectures are good but not amazing, he teaches in a memorable way but it's sometimes hard to know what will come up on exams. Some of the exam questions were about specific videos that we never watched. Pleasant guy, decent professor.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Took professor Young first semester of my freshman year, still my favorite class I've taken thus far. Most fair and understanding professor I've had, class is engaging and straightforward. Attendance is mandatory but for good reason- the class isn't lecture heavy at all most of the in class time is spent actually doing speeches or giving feedback.
Would 100% take this professor for public speaking! He cares for you to get better at public speaking and will help you with anything you need help with along the way! Very funny professor!

I took Professor Young for the summer 2022 semester. This was an 8 week class that consisted of a few things. You have to do 5/6 case studies which basically are 2 page papers where you are responding to questions in the textbook based off a management situation. We also had reading quizzes that were fairly easy. 3 test  and a few discussions.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Dr. Young is an amazing professor! I would recommend taking his COMM2129 class if you prefer easy topics for speeches and constant positive feedback and support. He is extremely kind-hearted and will always steer you in the right direction speech wise, and for a person who has terrible anxiety, especially speech anxiety, he always provides support.

Dr. Young is a fantastic professor. I highly recommend his class for anyone that needs to take Human Communication, his class is graded by a midterm, a final, Pearson homework, and points are given for in class participation assignments. He's entertaining, hilarious, and a great lecturer. If you have the chance to take his class, do it.

Coolest prof ever!! Really cares about his students, always willing to talk, easy class, funny lectures, encouraging, and just overall a great guy!! Grades based on 2 tests and Pearson HW. Go to class to get participation points!! 11/10 recommend
I HATE speaking but Steven made it so much fun! This class is an easy A. Two textbooks have to be purchased but one of them can be found as a pdf. Take his class, you wont regret it
Prof. Young is a great teacher and very funny and relatable. We had 2 tests in the semester and weekly assignments. I highly recommend this class
Hes a great professor and makes the class easy and engaging for his students.
Very easy class and he's funny.

Really great professor, really cares about what the student learns and overall really knows what hes doing. Attendance is necessary, but he gives five unexcused absences throughout the semester. If you pay attention in class and do the work on time there should be no reason to fail.

very chill guy! need more professors like him! i didnt go to class often but he grades the speeches fairly strict but is very understanding about lifes difficulties! as long as you do the homework and improve on speeches youll pass! fun activities too!

I 100% recommend him for public speaking! As someone who is extremely shy, his class helped me so much and I was able to pass with an easy A. You get to pick what your topic is as long as it's within the speech criteria and if you help with the timer or video, you get extra credit. Show up to class though, especially speech days! Great professor!

I absolutely adore him for Public Speaking. I hate public speaking, but he makes it actually enjoyable. He genuinely cares for his students and is there for you if you need him. I would take him for every class if I could. Attendance is pretty much mandatory especially on speech days as there is a participation grade. Definitely take him!
